__e: First thought I had when I held that money in my hands was that empty old snuff box.
Which turned out to be chewing tobacco, which matched the chewing tobacco that you stole from a club that you entered without a warrant or a badge.
You have any idea when that tobacco crop might be ready to sell?
How would I afford my tobacco and my tea?
Well you see, I can smell tobacco in here, which isn't the smell of a now-and-again spliff, so if you're not smoking the tobacco, who is?
And it isn't tobacco. Which is legal in D.C. the last time I checked.
